title: THURSDAY 2/25 - Tom Brady's future in Tampa
itunes:title: THURSDAY 2/25 - Tom Brady's future in Tampa
description:
Buccaneers head coach Bruce Arians gives us a health update on Tom Brady's injured knee (0:07) while GM Todd Licht talks Brady's future with the Bucs (0:31). Steelers wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster talks about Ben Roethlisberger's future (1:16) and discusses where he sees himself playing next season as well (1:36). 49ers GM John Lynch says Jimmy Garoppolo will be the Niners QB moving forward (2:07) and Dez Bryant ready to move on from the Ravens (2:27)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
